actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 3 (1d4+1) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing and Sight
special_abilities.desc: The owl's Perception is 18 when perceiving by hearing or sight.

special_abilities.name: Quiet Wings
special_abilities.desc: The owl's Stealth is 18 while flying.
